headline: US refiner HF Sinclair posts smaller-than-expected loss in first quarter
summary: U.S. refiner HF Sinclairposted a smaller-than-expected loss in the firstquarter on Thursday, supported by an improvement in refiningmargins. The refining industry is bracing for...
